thread.title: Street Fighter 5's second beta test kicks off later this month - Gaming
thread.title_full: Street Fighter 5's second beta test kicks off later this month - Gaming News - Digital Spy

author: Liam Martin
title: Street Fighter 5's second beta test kicks off later this month - Gaming
text: Street Fighter 5's second beta will kick off later this month, Capcom has announced.Featuring cross-platform play between PS4 and PC, the second beta runs from October 22 until October 25 on PlayStation 4. Â© Capcom Unfortunately, PC users won't get quite so much hands-on time, as the beta doesn't kick off until October 24.The beta launches with Ken, Necalli, Vega and R. Mika, while newcomer Rashid joins the roster on October 23, followed by Karin a day later.There's no word on the recently leaked Brazilian fighter Laura, who's expected to be unveiled during this week's Brazil Game Show.In addition to Ranked matchmaking, leaderboards and player search, Capcom will also be testing out the new Fight Money feature, which is an in-game currency used to unlock items.Street Fighter 5 is scheduled for release in 2016 on PS4 on PC.Check out our most anticipated games of October, one of many videos in Digital Spy's dedicated Gaming YouTube channel. Be sure to subscribe!
